p: The hydrodistillation yielded 1.52% of the EO of P. elongata. The main compounds ( Table 1) were geranial ( 1) (50.76%) and neral ( 2) (39.35%), accounting for a citral content corresponding to around 90% of the total relative composition. The third main compound (isocitral<E->) ( 3) corresponded to only 1.41%of the EO.
